document_notes.text:
This update for fribidi fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-25308: Fixed stack out of bounds read (bsc#1196147).
- CVE-2022-25309: Fixed heap-buffer-overflow in fribidi_cap_rtl_to_unicode (bsc#1196148).
- CVE-2022-25310: Fixed NULL pointer dereference in fribidi_remove_bidi_marks (bsc#1196150).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: A stack-based buffer overflow flaw was found in the Fribidi package. This flaw allows an attacker to pass a specially crafted file to the Fribidi application, which leads to a possible memory leak or a denial of service.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

product_id: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5:fribidi-0.19.2-14.3.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5:fribidi-32bit-0.19.2-14.3.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP5:fribidi-devel-0.19.2-14.3.1

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: A heap-based buffer overflow flaw was found in the Fribidi package and affects the fribidi_cap_rtl_to_unicode() function of the fribidi-char-sets-cap-rtl.c file. This flaw allows an attacker to pass a specially crafted file to the Fribidi application with the '--caprtl' option, leading to a crash and causing a denial of service.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

product_id: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5:fribidi-0.19.2-14.3.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5:fribidi-32bit-0.19.2-14.3.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP5:fribidi-devel-0.19.2-14.3.1

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: A segmentation fault (SEGV) flaw was found in the Fribidi package and affects the fribidi_remove_bidi_marks() function of the lib/fribidi.c file. This flaw allows an attacker to pass a specially crafted file to Fribidi, leading to a crash and causing a denial of service.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

product_id: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5:fribidi-0.19.2-14.3.1

SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP5:fribidi-devel-0.19.2-14.3.1

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
